name: Faizan
description: Faizan Tu hai hi gandu ye aisi shakal bana ke laptop ke samne baitha hota hai jaise processor uska rishtedaar ho aur RAM ne uska qarza maar liya ho. Bug usko dekh ke kehta hai, 'bhai main hi galat hoon ya tu system error hai?'
character: The Gandu of all the Time

name: Zubair Gujjar
description: Zubair itna intelligent hai ke compiler bhi usse permission maangta hai run hone se pehle. Lekin zindagi ke bugs usse bhi handle nahi hote.

name: Ammad Pervaiz
description: Class mein hamesha late lekin notes uske encyclopedia hote hain. Pata nahi notes likhta hai ya Wikipedia chalata hai — aur har dafa muft ka burger dhundh leta hai.

name: Affaq
description: Har waqt chup lekin sab kaam isse pehle kar leta hai. Campus ke andar Google Maps chalana band karo, Afaq se pucho shortcut.

name: Arif
description: Arif aisi explanation deta hai ke professors bhi usse notes lete hain. Har shakhs ko impress karne ka license mila hua hai jaise MI6 ka agent ho.

name: Basit
description: Basit ke paas wo gadgets hote hain jo market mein aaye hi nahi. Assignment dekh ke lagta hai launch event ho raha hai, product nahi.

name: Ahad
description: Hamesha coffee ke sath chipka rehta hai. Kehne ko kehta hai 'maine kuch nahi parha' — lekin GPA uska Harvard ka rishtedaar lagta hai.

name: Moez
description: Group project ka Modi — sab control mein rakhta hai. Color-coded schedule dekh ke lagta hai bullet journal ka influencer hai.

name: Yousouf
description: Wo banda jo woh sawaal poochta hai jo sabke zehan mein hota hai lekin bolne ki himmat nahi hoti. Aur har professor ko 'sir' bolta hai, gender chhoro.

name: Shoaib
description: Iske bag mein snack, power bank, charger, duct tape — har cheez milti hai. Zombie apocalypse aaye toh Shoaib ke bag mein chhup jao.

name: Zain Kazmi
description: Zain woh banda hai jo har department ki farewell mein hota hai, khud pata nahi kis department ka hai. Jaise campus ka Ranveer Singh ho.

name: Bilal Ibex
description: Har assignment art gallery ka piece lagta hai. Uski presentation pe log kharay ho ke taaliyan bajate hain, marks secondary hote hain.

name: Mohsin
description: Ye banda wo hai jo sab ki help karta hai lekin khud kabhi help nahi maangta. Memory aisi ke lecture slides uske DNA ka part hain.

name: Burhan Hashimi
description: Debate ka aisa master ke professor bhi haar jaate hain. Har baat ka counter hota hai — shayad court mein born hua tha.

name: Obaid Arshad
description: Study session ka naam hota hai, lekin party hoti hai. Notes itne mashhoor hain ke dusre departments mein photocopy hoti hai.

name: Arman Ahmad
description: Projector kharab ho, mouse na chale — banda duct tape aur paper clip se NASA ka shuttle bana de.

name: Wali Khan
description: Wali push-up karte hue calculus samjha deta hai. Physical aur intellectual dono ka hybrid model.

name: Hamza Ikhlaq
description: Statistics ka lecture bhi stand-up comedy lagta hai jab ye bolta hai. Notes padho toh Hansna zaroori hai.

name: Haroon
description: Casual baat bhi kare toh existential crisis de deta hai. Har conversation ka end hota hai ‘lekin kya hum waqai real hain?’

name: Waleed
description: Teen startups, chaar freelance clients aur GPA bhi sahi — banda hai ya Elon Musk ka junior?

name: Obaid Hashmi
description: Cafeteria ka Gordon Ramsay. Har bite ka review deta hai — aur har snack ka GPS location maloom hai.

name: Muaz Iqbal
description: 20-page ka paper ek raat mein likhta hai aur 'A' le aata hai. Deadline ke saath dosti rakh rakhi hai.

name: Sheraz
description: Lab goggles pehne hue bhi runway model lagta hai. Har class uska fashion show hai, subject kuch bhi ho.

name: Nabeel
description: Pehle teen seconds mein gaana pehchaan leta hai. Har subject ka apna playlist bana ke rakha hai.

name: Bilal Ikram
description: Ye society Kaliya Bohat he Zahreela Snake hai is ko zubair nai hath pakar kr chalna sikhaya tha our ab ye sab ka pakarta hai  .

name: Burhan
description: Sports ka data scientist. Har match ka score yaad, aur apne team ke liye Excel charts banata hai.

name: Abdul Hameed
description: Coding problem ko historical war se relate karta hai. Debugging uske liye Cold War ka mission hota hai.

name: Ibrahim
description: Finals week mein bhi Buddha ki tarah peaceful hota hai. Debugging mein yoga jaise calm hota hai.

name: Sher Afghan
description: Har weekend pe aisi story hoti hai jo professor bhi digest nahi kar sakta. Theory ko practically jungle mein test karta hai.

name: Muzamil Mushtaq
description: Code aisa clean ke professors usse textbook mein daalna chahein. Har function ke sath love letter jaisi documentation.

name: Abdul Rauf
description: Har naye student ka unofficial mentor. Concepts memes se samjhaata hai — aur samajh bhi aa jaate hain!

name: Default Student
description: Ye banda real bhi hai ya myth — koi confirm nahi kar saka. Har class mein virtually tha even before it was a trend.
